0100110100010100 1100010010001100 0 -> sum: 0001000110100000, cout: 1

0010011001110000 0100101110100001 0 -> sum: 0111001000010001, cout: 0
0100100011010001 0101110100011010 1 -> sum: 1010010111101100, cout: 0
1000001001101000 0001000001001011 1 -> sum: 1001001010110100, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
